extension_name.description: The field, that describes name of extension.

extension_short_name.description: The field, that describes short name of extension.

extension_description.message: The extension for convenient search on the Internet.
extension_description.description: The field, that describes description of extension.

extension_default_title.description: The field, that describes default title of extension.

popup_menu_general.description: The field, that describes default text of popup menu (General).

popup_menu_special.description: The field, that describes default text of popup menu (Special).
